title: Travel Webpage
description: Responsive travel landing page with Bootstrap

title: Weather Mobile App
description: A React Native weather application with location-based forecasts, interactive maps using MapBox, push notifications for weather alerts, offline data caching, and beautiful animated weather icons. Integrates with OpenWeather API.

title: RESTful API Service
description: A scalable RESTful API service built with Node.js and Express, featuring JWT authentication, rate limiting, Redis caching, input validation, error handling, and comprehensive API documentation using Swagger. Deployed on AWS with CI/CD pipeline.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A responsive portfolio website built with vanilla JavaScript, featuring dynamic content loading from JSON, dark/light mode toggle, smooth scroll animations using AOS library, contact form validation, and admin panel for content management.

title: Real-time Chat Application
description: A real-time chat application with private messaging, group chats, file sharing capabilities, emoji support, message encryption, and user presence indicators. Built with React and Socket.io, featuring Cloudinary for media storage.

title: Fitness Tracking App
description: A comprehensive fitness tracking mobile application with workout logging, progress tracking, social features, meal planning, and integration with wearable devices. Features custom workout builder and nutrition database.

title: Blog CMS Platform
description: A content management system for bloggers with rich text editor, media management, SEO optimization, comment system, user roles, and analytics dashboard. Built with Next.js for optimal performance and SEO.

title: GraphQL API Gateway
description: A GraphQL API gateway that aggregates multiple REST APIs, provides unified data access, implements caching strategies, and includes real-time subscriptions. Features comprehensive error handling and monitoring.

title: Expense Tracker PWA
description: A Progressive Web App for expense tracking with offline functionality, budget management, expense categorization, receipt scanning using OCR, and detailed financial reports with charts and insights.
